overview:
Ami Vider is a social networking and blogging professionals. Since 2006 he has been advising, writing, editing and publishing blogs for technology companies. In addition, he trains and advises executives in the use of social media for marketing and image promotion.

In the past, Ami has been a chip designer (non-volatile memory / EE and FPGA) and a field engineer for storage companies and design software (CAD/EDA).
